items.name: init(mType: OSType, mSubType: OSType, mManufacturer: OSType)
var mManufacturer: OSType
items.desc: The four character code for the codec manufacturer. This must be a unique code registered with Apple.

items.name: var mSubType: OSType
items.desc: The four character code for the codec subtype. Defined by the codec manufacturer.

items.name: var mType: OSType
items.desc: The four character code for the codec type. Defined by the codec manufacturer.
